full_text: Screened by NARA, 5/10/2023 AFFIDAVIT June 1, , 1970 American Council of Immigration Gentlemen: We FOIA (b)(6) agree to sponsor the entry of Nicolas Ramirez into the United States. We agree that we will be responsible for the person and his financial need so long as he is in the United States, FOIA (b)(6) STATE OF CALIFORNIA COUNTY OF SS. Los Angeles On June 1, 1970 before me, the undersigned, a Notary Public in and for said County and State. personally appeared FOIA (b)(6) known to THE tarbe the person(s)-whese subscribed to BM the within instrument OFFICIAL and acknowledged SEAL that the SAMERCEDES HORNSBY NOTARY PUBLIC CALIFORNIA (Seal) PRINCIPAL OFFICE IN CALIFORNIA LOS ANGELES COUNTY My Commission:Expirate (Notary signature Amount 19, 1972 Mercedes Hornsby ("His name (notary's) shall be typed or legibly printed") (Sec. 8205 - Government Code 1959 Misc.-166 (Rev. 2-60) (G.S.) Ack. General (Photo Form) 2-17-60 (8 pt.)
